sys_script.name: Audit View Restrictions

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_dosny_bit_procur_bit_noncompetitive_small_purchase</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Audit View Restrictions</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

  if (gs.getSession().isInteractive()) {

         var view_name = RP.getViewName();

         if((view_name == 'Audit View')) {
			gs.addInfoMessage("View Name" + view_name);			
      
            current.addQuery('status', '==', 4).addOrCondition('status', '==', 3);
         }
  }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>clombardi</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-26 19:12:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c9e6c0001b6ea550baac766e034bcbdb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Audit View Restrictions</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BIT Procurement" source="x_dosny_bit_procur">6f7103ea1b449d5010c26391ec4bcb6f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BIT Procurement">6f7103ea1b449d5010c26391ec4bcb6f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c9e6c0001b6ea550baac766e034bcbdb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>clombardi</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-26 19:18:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c9e6c0001b6ea550baac766e034bcbdb"/></record_update>
